monogr.title: The Oedipus Tyrannus of Sophocles. Edited with introduction and notes by Sir Richard Jebb.

respStmt.name: EM, Scott Ettinger and Roger Travis

change.item: Text scanned at U. Chicago in 1988. Basic SGML tagging by EM, Scott Ettinger and Roger Travis.
Final check of cardbreaks, tags, and linenumbers.
Check text against TLG Sophocles in order to discover if there are any missing whole words or lines..

Revision 1.1  2009-12-08 18:56:08  rsingh04
moved more xml files around based on copyright status

Revision 1.2  2005/08/01 16:30:23  packel
removed stray item tags

Revision 1.1  2005/07/25 15:03:21  packel
Converted to XML

Revision 1.14  2004/06/14 18:49:32  lcerrato
changed speaker at lines 1071-2 to Jocasta, as confirmed by source

Revision 1.13  2004/04/21 20:42:00  mimno
added card 1s

Revision 1.12  2003/07/01 22:18:08  yorkc
Updated texts to TEI P4 and Perseus P4 extensions; minor cleanup (esp. character encodings and typos.)

Revision 1.11  2003/05/21 21:31:50  lcerrato
added missing speaker at 1158: confirmed with source

Revision 1.10  2000/03/22 14:33:44  amahoney
remove stray punctuation in author field, for biblio display

Revision 1.9  2000/03/04 20:35:17  dasmith
Added separate funder entity to TEI header.

Revision 1.8  2000/02/15 23:18:02  amahoney
use n attribute on sp element to carry over the speaker name when
the speech is interrupted by a card break;  this also requires that
the card break at the end come after the close of the sp, not within

Revision 1.7  1999/11/24 21:12:07  amahoney
Bring remaining files up to new DTD;  use part=i and part=f for
antilabe in all files

Revision 1.6  1999/11/08 20:15:42  amahoney
use entities from the ISO diacriticals set as a first approximation
to metrical symbols;  the old DTD had some, but the new one doesn't yet.

Revision 1.5  1999/11/05 22:48:43  amahoney
convert to TEI P3

sp.speaker: *oi)di/pous
l: w)= te/kna, *ka/dmou tou= pa/lai ne/a trofh/,
ti/nas poq' e(/dras ta/sde moi qoa/zete
i(kthri/ois kla/doisin e)cestemme/noi;
po/lis d' o(mou= me\n qumiama/twn ge/mei,

l.#text: o(mou= de\ paia/nwn te kai\ stenagma/twn:

l: a(gw\ dikaiw=n mh\ par' a)gge/lwn, te/kna,
a)/llwn a)kou/ein au)to\s w(=d' e)lh/luqa,
o( pa=si kleino\s *oi)di/pous kalou/menos.
a)ll' w)= geraie/, fra/z', e)pei\ pre/pwn e)/fus

l.#text: pro\ tw=nde fwnei=n, ti/ni tro/pw| kaqe/state,

l: dei/santes h)\ ste/rcantes; w(s qe/lontos a)\n

ei)/hn toia/nde mh\ ou) katoikti/rwn e(/dran.

sp.speaker: *(iereu/s
l: a)ll' w)= kratu/nwn *oi)di/pous xw/ras e)mh=s,

l.#text: o(ra=|s me\n h(ma=s h(li/koi prosh/meqa

l: bwmoi=si toi=s soi=s:  oi( me\n ou)de/pw makra\n
pte/sqai sqe/nontes, oi( de\ su\n gh/ra| barei=s,
i(erh=s, e)gw\ me\n *zhno/s, oi(/de t' h)|qe/wn
lektoi/:  to\ d' a)/llo fu=lon e)cestemme/non

l.#text: a)gorai=si qakei= pro/s te *palla/dos diploi=s

l: naoi=s, e)p' *)ismhnou= te mantei/a| spodw=|.
po/lis ga/r, w(/sper kau)to\s ei)sora=|s, a)/gan
h)/dh saleu/ei ka)nakoufi/sai ka/ra
buqw=n e)/t' ou)x oi(/a te foini/ou sa/lou,

l.#text: fqi/nousa me\n ka/lucin e)gka/rpois xqono/s,

l: fqi/nousa d' a)ge/lais bouno/mois to/koisi/ te
a)go/nois gunaikw=n:  e)n d' o( purfo/ros qeo\s
skh/yas e)lau/nei, loimo\s e)/xqistos, po/lin,
u(f' ou(= kenou=tai dw=ma *kadmei=on, me/las d'

l.#text: *(/aidhs stenagmoi=s kai\ go/ois plouti/zetai.

l: qeoi=si me/n nun ou)k i)sou/meno/n s' e)gw\
ou)d' oi(/de pai=des e(zo/mesq' e)fe/stioi,
a)ndrw=n de\ prw=ton e)/n te sumforai=s bi/ou
kri/nontes e)/n te daimo/nwn sunallagai=s:

l.#text: o(/s g' e)ce/lusas a)/stu *kadmei=on molw\n

l: sklhra=s a)oidou= dasmo\n o(\n parei/xomen,
kai\ tau=q' u(f' h(mw=n ou)de\n e)ceidw\s ple/on
ou)d' e)kdidaxqei/s, a)lla\ prosqh/kh| qeou=
le/gei nomi/zei q' h(mi\n o)rqw=sai bi/on:

l.#text: nu=n t', w)= kra/tiston pa=sin *oi)di/pou ka/ra,

l: i(keteu/ome/n se pa/ntes oi(/de pro/stropoi
a)lkh/n tin' eu(rei=n h(mi/n, ei)/te tou qew=n
fh/mhn a)kou/sas ei)/t' a)p' a)ndro\s oi)=sqa/ tou:
w(s toi=sin e)mpei/roisi kai\ ta\s cumfora\s

l.#text: zw/sas o(rw= ma/lista tw=n bouleuma/twn.

l: i)/q', w)= brotw=n a)/rist', a)no/rqwson po/lin,
i)/q', eu)labh/qhq': w(s se\ nu=n me\n h(/de gh=
swth=ra klh/|zei th=s pa/ros proqumi/as:
a)rxh=s de\ th=s sh=s mhdamw=s memnw/meqa

l.#text: sta/ntes t'  e)s o)rqo\n kai\ peso/ntes u(/steron.

l: a)ll' a)sfalei/a| th/nd' a)no/rqwson po/lin:
o)/rniqi ga\r kai\ th\n to/t' ai)si/w| tu/xhn
pare/sxes h(mi=n, kai\ tanu=n i)/sos genou=.
w(s ei)/per a)/rceis th=sde gh=s, w(/sper kratei=s,

l.#text: cu\n a)ndra/sin ka/llion h)\ kenh=s kratei=n:

l: w(s ou)de/n e)stin ou)/te pu/rgos ou)/te nau=s
e)/rhmos a)ndrw=n mh\ cunoikou/ntwn e)/sw.

sp.speaker: *oi)di/pous
l: w)= pai=des oi)ktroi/, gnwta\ kou)k a)/gnwta/ moi
prosh/lqeq' i(mei/rontes:  eu)= ga\r oi)=d' o(/ti

l.#text: w(/st' ou)x u(/pnw| g' eu(/donta/ m' e)cegei/rete,

l: a)ll' i)/ste polla\ me/n me dakru/santa dh/,

h(\n d' eu)= skopw=n hu(/riskon i)/asin mo/nhn,

l.#text: *kre/ont', e)mautou= gambro/n, e)s ta\ *puqika\

drw=n h)\ ti/ fwnw=n th/nde r(usai/mhn po/lin.

mh\ drw=n a)\n ei)/hn pa/nq' o(/s' a)\n dhloi= qeo/s.

l: a)ll' ei)s kalo\n su/ t' ei)=pas oi(/de t' a)rti/ws

sp.speaker: *oi)di/pous
l: ta/x' ei)so/mesqa:  cu/mmetros ga\r w(s klu/ein.

l: ti/n' h(mi\n h(/keis tou= qeou= fh/mhn fe/rwn;

sp.speaker: *kre/wn

l: ai)tei=s:  a(\ d' ai)tei=s, ta)/m' e)a\n qe/lh|s e)/ph

a)lkh\n la/bois a)\n ka)nakou/fisin kakw=n:

nu=n d' u(/steros ga\r a)sto\s ei)s a)stou\s telw=,

l: tou=ton keleu/w pa/nta shmai/nein e)moi/:
kei) me\n fobei=tai, tou)pi/klhm' u(pecelei=n

ke/rdos telw= 'gw\ xh) xa/ris proskei/setai.
ei) d' au)= siwph/sesqe, kai/ tis h)\ fi/lou
dei/sas a)pw/sei tou)/pos h)\ xau)tou= to/de,

th=sd', h(=s e)gw\ kra/th te kai\ qro/nous ne/mw,
mh/t' ei)sde/xesqai mh/te prosfwnei=n tina,
mh/t' e)n qew=n eu)xai=si mh/te qu/masin

tou=d' h(mi\n o)/ntos, w(s to\ *puqiko\n qeou=

e)gw\ me\n ou)=n toio/sde tw=| te dai/moni

l.#text: tw=| t' a)ndri\ tw=| qano/nti su/mmaxos pe/lw:

l: kateu/xomai de\ to\n dedrako/t', ei)/te tis
ei(=s w)\n le/lhqen ei)/te pleio/nwn me/ta,
kako\n kakw=s nin a)/moron e)ktri=yai bi/on:
